finance-teens-1.title: Pocket Money Story
finance-teens-1.description: You receive pocket money. Do you save a portion or spend it all?

finance-teens-2.title: Quiz on Savings Rate
finance-teens-2.description: What percentage of income should you save? (a) 0%, (b) 10%, (c) 20%+

finance-teens-3.title: Reflex Smart Saver
finance-teens-3.description: Tap quickly for "Save" words, avoid "Waste" words

finance-teens-5.title: Salary Story
finance-teens-5.description: You get your first part-time job salary. How do you manage it?

finance-teens-6.title: Debate: Save vs Spend
finance-teens-6.description: Participate in a debate on saving vs spending

finance-teens-7.title: Journal of Saving Goal
finance-teens-7.description: Write about your personal saving goals

finance-teens-8.title: Simulation: Monthly Money
finance-teens-8.description: Manage a monthly budget with income and expenses

finance-teens-9.title: Reflex: Wise Use
finance-teens-9.description: Tap for wise financial decisions, avoid impulsive choices

finance-teens-10.title: Badge: Smart Saver
finance-teens-10.description: Earn your badge for completing saving challenges

finance-teens-11.title: Savings Saga
finance-teens-11.description: You get ₹500 monthly. Spend all on food or divide into needs/wants/savings? → Divide.

finance-teens-12.title: Spending Quiz
finance-teens-12.description: Test your knowledge on smart spending habits

finance-teens-13.title: Reflex: Wise Choices
finance-teens-13.description: Make quick decisions between needs and wants

finance-teens-14.title: Puzzle: Smart Spending
finance-teens-14.description: Match spending concepts with their definitions

finance-teens-15.title: Party Story
finance-teens-15.description: Plan a party within budget constraints

finance-teens-16.title: Debate: Needs vs Wants
finance-teens-16.description: Debate the difference between needs and wants

finance-teens-18.title: Simulation: Shopping Mall
finance-teens-18.description: Make purchasing decisions in a shopping mall simulation

finance-teens-19.title: Reflex: Control
finance-teens-19.description: Practice spending control with quick decisions

finance-teens-20.title: Badge: Smart Spender Teen
finance-teens-20.description: Earn your badge for completing all teen finance challenges

finance-teens-21.title: Allowance Story
finance-teens-21.description: You get ₹500 monthly. Spend wisely or divide into needs/wants/savings?

finance-teens-22.title: Budget Quiz
finance-teens-22.description: If you spend ₹300 and save ₹200 from ₹500, what % is saved?

finance-teens-23.title: Reflex Budget Check
finance-teens-23.description: Tap quickly to track expenses and avoid forgetting to save

finance-teens-24.title: Puzzle of Priorities
finance-teens-24.description: Match Must vs Want expenses correctly

finance-teens-25.title: College Story
finance-teens-25.description: Smart spending choices as a student with pocket money

finance-teens-26.title: Debate: Budget Freedom
finance-teens-26.description: Does budgeting give freedom or limit it? Participate in the debate.

finance-teens-27.title: Journal of Planning
finance-teens-27.description: Write: 'One monthly budget I want to create is ___.'

finance-teens-28.title: Simulation: Monthly Allowance
finance-teens-28.description: Allocate ₹1000: ₹400 food, ₹300 transport, ₹200 save, ₹100 fun. Correct = balanced budget.

finance-teens-29.title: Reflex Budget Smarts
finance-teens-29.description: Tap quickly: 'Plan Future' or 'Empty Wallet' to test reflex budget skills.

finance-teens-30.title: Badge: Budget Hero
finance-teens-30.description: Finish 5 budgeting scenarios to earn the 'Budget Hero' badge.

finance-teens-31.title: Movie vs Bus Fare Story
finance-teens-31.description: You have ₹100. Do you spend on a movie or keep for a bus pass? → Choose bus pass.

finance-teens-32.title: Needs vs Wants Quiz
finance-teens-32.description: Which is a want? (a) Medicine, (b) School clothes, (c) Luxury watch). Correct = Luxury watch.

finance-teens-33.title: Reflex Decision
finance-teens-33.description: Tap quickly: 'Pay Fees' or 'Skip Fees for Gadgets.' Correct = Pay Fees.

finance-teens-34.title: Puzzle: Real Priorities
finance-teens-34.description: Match items: Shelter → Need, Gaming Console → Want.

finance-teens-35.title: Exam Prep Story
finance-teens-35.description: You have some money left — spend on tuition or snacks? Correct = Tuition.

finance-teens-36.title: Debate: Wants Matter Too?
finance-teens-36.description: Should we ignore wants completely? → No, balance both.

finance-teens-37.title: Journal of Balance
finance-teens-37.description: Write: 'One want I sacrificed for a need was ___.'

finance-teens-38.title: Simulation: Monthly Budget
finance-teens-38.description: ₹2000 allowance. Needs: ₹1200, Wants: ₹800. Correct balance = Pay needs first.

finance-teens-39.title: Reflex Smart Spend
finance-teens-39.description: Tap for 'Pay Rent' or 'Luxury Party.' Correct = Pay Rent.

finance-teens-40.title: Badge: Wise Chooser
finance-teens-40.description: Handle 5 needs vs wants dilemmas correctly to earn the 'Wise Chooser' badge.

finance-teens-41.title: Online Payment Story
finance-teens-41.description: You buy a book online. Pay with cash or UPI safely? → Choose UPI safely.

finance-teens-42.title: Quiz on Digital Money
finance-teens-42.description: Which is safer? (a) Share PIN, (b) Keep PIN secret). Correct = Keep PIN secret.

finance-teens-43.title: Reflex Secure Use
finance-teens-43.description: Tap for 'Strong Password' or '1234.' Correct = Strong Password.

finance-teens-44.title: Puzzle of Digital Tools
finance-teens-44.description: Match: UPI → PhonePe, Debit Card → ATM, OTP → Security.

finance-teens-45.title: Online Fraud Story
finance-teens-45.description: A stranger asks for your bank PIN. Do you share? → No.

finance-teens-46.title: Debate: Cash vs Digital
finance-teens-46.description: Which is better for the future — cash or digital money? → Digital with safety.

finance-teens-47.title: Journal of Digital Use
finance-teens-47.description: Write: 'One safe way I used online money was ___.'

finance-teens-48.title: Simulation: Digital Spend
finance-teens-48.description: Balance ₹1000. Pay ₹200 for food, ₹300 for a book. Correct balance left = ₹500.

finance-teens-49.title: Reflex Fraud Alert
finance-teens-49.description: Tap for 'Ignore Scam Link' or 'Click Suspicious Link.' Correct = Ignore Scam Link.

finance-teens-50.title: Badge: Digital Money Smart
finance-teens-50.description: Safely use digital money in 5 cases to earn the 'Digital Money Smart' badge.

finance-teens-51.title: Money Borrow Story
finance-teens-51.description: Teen borrows ₹100 from a friend. Forgetting to repay? → Wrong.

finance-teens-52.title: Debt Quiz
finance-teens-52.description: Borrow ₹100, repay ₹120. What is extra ₹20 called? → Interest.

finance-teens-53.title: Reflex Debt Dangers
finance-teens-53.description: Tap for 'Repay Loan' or 'Ignore Loan.' Correct = Repay Loan.

finance-teens-55.title: Borrowing Story
finance-teens-55.description: Teen borrows for a new phone. Can't repay? Result → Debt.

finance-teens-56.title: Debate: Borrow Good or Bad?
finance-teens-56.description: Is borrowing always bad? → No, good if planned & repaid.

finance-teens-57.title: Journal of Borrowing
finance-teens-57.description: Write: 'One time I borrowed money and handled it responsibly was ___.'

finance-teens-59.title: Reflex Debt Control
finance-teens-59.description: Tap for 'Borrow Wisely' or 'Overspend + Debt.' Correct = Borrow Wisely.

finance-teens-60.title: Badge: Debt Smart
finance-teens-60.description: Handle 5 borrowing dilemmas responsibly to earn the 'Debt Smart' badge.

finance-teens-61.title: Savings Account Story
finance-teens-61.description: You deposit ₹1000. After a year, it becomes ₹1050. Why? → Interest.

finance-teens-62.title: Investment Quiz
finance-teens-62.description: Which is riskier but higher return? (a) Fixed Deposit, (b) Stock Market). Correct = Stock Market.

finance-teens-63.title: Reflex Investor Smartness
finance-teens-63.description: Tap for 'Diversify' or 'Put All in One.' Correct = Diversify.

finance-teens-64.title: Puzzle of Investment Types
finance-teens-64.description: Match: FD → Safe, Stocks → Risky, Mutual Fund → Mixed.

finance-teens-65.title: Startup Story
finance-teens-65.description: Friend invests ₹100 in a lemonade stand. Earns ₹150. Smart? → Yes.

finance-teens-66.title: Debate: Save vs Invest
finance-teens-66.description: Is saving enough or should we invest too? → Invest wisely.

finance-teens-67.title: Journal of Future Investing
finance-teens-67.description: Write: 'One investment I'd like to try when older is ___.'

finance-teens-68.title: Simulation: ₹1000 Choice
finance-teens-68.description: ₹1000 → Options: (a) FD, (b) Stocks, (c) Spend. Best = Mix FD + Stocks.

finance-teens-69.title: Reflex Smart Growth
finance-teens-69.description: Tap for 'Long-term Invest' or 'Instant Spend.' Correct = Long-term Invest.

finance-teens-70.title: Badge: Smart Investor
finance-teens-70.description: Handle 5 investment challenges to earn the 'Smart Investor' badge.

finance-teens-71.title: Startup Idea Story
finance-teens-71.description: Teen sells handmade crafts online. Is this entrepreneurship? → Yes.

finance-teens-72.title: Quiz on Entrepreneurship
finance-teens-72.description: Who is an entrepreneur? (a) Creates new business, (b) Only spends, (c) Does nothing). Correct = Creates new business.

finance-teens-73.title: Reflex Entrepreneur Traits
finance-teens-73.description: Tap for 'Innovate' or 'Copy Always.' Correct = Innovate.

finance-teens-74.title: Puzzle of Entrepreneurs
finance-teens-74.description: Match: Ratan Tata → Industry, Elon Musk → Innovation, Narayana Murthy → IT.

finance-teens-75.title: Business Risk Story
finance-teens-75.description: You invest ₹200 in snacks to sell. Earn ₹300. Good? → Yes.

finance-teens-76.title: Debate: Job vs Business
finance-teens-76.description: Is it better to do a job or start a business? → Depends, but business builds independence.

finance-teens-77.title: Journal of Entrepreneur Dream
finance-teens-77.description: Write: 'One business I want to start is ___.'

finance-teens-78.title: Simulation: Mini Startup
finance-teens-78.description: You have ₹500 to start a snack stall. Buy ingredients (₹300), profit ₹200. Smart? → Yes.

finance-teens-79.title: Reflex Smart Entrepreneur
finance-teens-79.description: Tap for 'Plan + Risk' or 'Spend All.' Correct = Plan + Risk.

finance-teens-80.title: Badge: Young Entrepreneur
finance-teens-80.description: Complete 5 business challenges to earn the 'Young Entrepreneur' badge.

finance-teens-81.title: Fake Online Offer Story
finance-teens-81.description: Website offers free phone if you pay ₹100. Correct = Refuse.

finance-teens-82.title: Consumer Quiz
finance-teens-82.description: If shopkeeper cheats, where can you complain? (a) Consumer Court, (b) Playground). Correct = Consumer Court.

finance-teens-83.title: Reflex Fraud Safety
finance-teens-83.description: Tap for 'Don't Share OTP' or 'Share OTP.' Correct = Don't Share OTP.

finance-teens-84.title: Puzzle of Rights
finance-teens-84.description: Match: Right to Safety → Safe Goods, Right to Information → Honest Label.

finance-teens-85.title: Fake Call Story
finance-teens-85.description: Caller asks bank details. Do you share? → No.

finance-teens-86.title: Debate: Cash vs Online Safety
finance-teens-86.description: Is online money more risky than cash? → Both need safety.

finance-teens-87.title: Journal of Consumer Rights
finance-teens-87.description: Write: 'One right I know as a consumer is ___.'

finance-teens-88.title: Simulation: Fraud Alert
finance-teens-88.description: Message: 'Win ₹1 lakh, click link.' Correct = Delete.

finance-teens-89.title: Reflex Scam Check
finance-teens-89.description: Tap for 'Report Scam' or 'Ignore Fraud.' Correct = Report Scam.

finance-teens-90.title: Badge: Consumer Protector
finance-teens-90.description: Solve 5 fraud cases to earn the 'Consumer Protector' badge.

finance-teens-91.title: Scholarship Story
finance-teens-91.description: Student lies to get extra scholarship. Correct action? → Be truthful.

finance-teens-92.title: Ethics Quiz
finance-teens-92.description: Is bribing for marks ethical? → No.

finance-teens-93.title: Reflex Ethical Choice
finance-teens-93.description: Tap for 'Fair Pay' or 'Cheat Pay.' Correct = Fair Pay.

finance-teens-95.title: Bribery Story
finance-teens-95.description: Official asks for bribe. Correct = Refuse.

finance-teens-96.title: Debate: Money & Morals
finance-teens-96.description: Does money test character? → Yes, ethics matter more.

finance-teens-97.title: Journal of Responsibility
finance-teens-97.description: Write: 'One way I will use money responsibly is ___.'

finance-teens-98.title: Simulation: Charity Choice
finance-teens-98.description: You have ₹1000. Spend all on gadgets or donate ₹200 + save ₹300 + spend ₹500? → Balanced.

finance-teens-99.title: Reflex Fairness
finance-teens-99.description: Tap for 'Be Fair' or 'Cheat Others.' Correct = Be Fair.

finance-teens-100.title: Badge: Ethical Financier
finance-teens-100.description: Complete 5 ethical finance dilemmas to earn the 'Ethical Financier' badge.
